item.description:
***If the meetup fills up, but you would still like to attend, I will do my best to accommodate everyone. I should be able to fit a few more people, I'll just have to find more wine and cheese pairings. :) ***


I'm starting a monthly "Girl's Night"!

So what are we going to do this this Girl's Night?! Whatever we decide! I'm hoping we'll have a theme for every month, and rotate to each others houses or to different locales. It'll be a great way to get out, make new friends, and have something to look forward to each month.

At the meeting, we will choose the date for the next Girl's Night, the location, the host, and the theme!

This Month's Girl's Night:
1. Date: Saturday, October 9th at 5pm
2. Location: Rebecca's House in Limington
3. Host: Rebecca
4. Theme: Wine & Cheese

This first Girl's Night will involve wine tasting, cheese tasting, and h'ordeurves! I'll have the movie "Bottle Shock" for us to watch.

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment when you RSVP:

1. 1 bottle of Chianti
2. Parmesan Cheese
3. 1 bottle of Merlot
4. Brie Cheese
5. 1 bottle of Pinot Noir
6. Gruyere
7. 1 bottle of Shiraz
8. Cheddar
9. 1 bottle of White Zinfandel
10. Asiago Cheese
11. 1 bottle of Cabernet Sauvignon
12. Colby
13. 1 bottle of Chardonnay
14. Gouda
15. Cabernet Franc
16. Swiss Cheese

You do not need to spend a lot on wine or the cheese. Our goal is to spend less than $12 for each item.

I hope to see you there!





This event is sponsored by:
Zeus's Closet
http://www.myzeussclo...
What does this mean to you?! They are covering your $1 meetup fees for this event!
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Wine & Cheese
